org.switchyard.admin.mbean

Interface ReferenceMXBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageMetricsMXBean

    public interface ReferenceMXBean
extends MessageMetricsMXBean
    Management interface for a composite reference consumed by a SwitchYard application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationMXBean getApplication()
      The application which uses this reference.
      List<BindingMXBean> getBindings()
      List of managed bindings used by this reference.
      String getInterface()
      The composite reference interface.
      String getName()
      Reference name.
      String getPromotedReference()
      The component reference that this composite reference promotes.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.switchyard.admin.mbean.MessageMetricsMXBean

        getAverageProcessingTime, getFaultCount, getMaxProcessingTime, getMinProcessingTime, getSuccessCount, getTotalCount, getTotalProcessingTime, reset

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Reference name.
        Returns:
        the name of this reference.

      • getPromotedReference

        String getPromotedReference()
        The component reference that this composite reference promotes.
        Returns:
        the component reference promoted by this reference.

      • getBindings

        List<BindingMXBean> getBindings()
        List of managed bindings used by this reference.

        The composite reference interface.
